<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->

Retrieves the summary of a WAFv2 Regex Pattern Set.


{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Aws = Pulumi.Aws;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Aws.WafV2.GetRegexPatternSet.InvokeAsync(new Aws.WafV2.GetRegexPatternSetArgs
        {
            Name = "some-regex-pattern-set",
            Scope = "REGIONAL",
        }));
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v3/go/aws/wafv2"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := wafv2.LookupRegexPatternSet(ctx, &wafv2.LookupRegexPatternSetArgs{
			Name:  "some-regex-pattern-set",
			Scope: "REGIONAL",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{% /example %}}
